meanings.meaning: be, feel, look, taste, etc. like nothing on earth

examples.korean: Now that you mention it, she did seem to be in a strange mood. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신이 그 말을 꺼내니까 하는 말인데, 그녀가 기분이 정말 이상해 보이긴 했어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Now that you mention it, she did seem to be in a strange mood. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’m having a bad hair today. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 오늘 머리 모양 이상해. DARAKWON
examples.english: I’m having a bad hair today. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I need to get my hair trimmed, my layers suck! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 머리 손질 좀 해야겠어, 층 내서 자른게 이상해! DARAKWON
examples.english: I need to get my hair trimmed, my layers suck! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It seemed queer for her to wander around all night. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 밤새 배회하는 것은 이상해 보였다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: It seemed queer for her to wander around all night. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: And she wonders why her white shirts are coming out pink. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그래 놓고 하얀 셔츠가 핑크색이 돼서 나온다고 이상해 하지. DARAKWON
examples.english: And she wonders why her white shirts are coming out pink. Add to Wordbook
